body:
UnifyCR has been renamed to UnifyFS. Renaming the Spack package is the last step in this process.
This renames the package and changes any UnifyCRs to UnifyFS within the package.

The only side effect this should have is to the [EcpIoSdk package](https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/f1bdaa11d46b7d7c7014509143fd68d895cbfe37/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/ecp-io-sdk/package.py) (@chuckatkins).
title: UnifyFS: new package - rename from UnifyCR
